Method1.name: Pomodoro technique
Method1.explaination: A time management method that involves breaking down work into intervals (typically 25 minutes) separated by short breaks

Method2.name: Eisenhower Matrix
Method2.explaination: A method of prioritizing tasks based on their importance and urgency

Method3.name: Time blocking
Method3.explaination: A method of scheduling where you block off specific periods of time for different tasks.
